email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to offer you a freight rate for 50,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai on CIF terms.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN STAR, with a DWT of 82,000 and LOA of 225m. The laycan is set for 15th to 20th November, and the loading window is 36 hours. The initial freight quote is USD 25.50 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the prompt offer. Given the current market conditions, I was hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 24.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
John Doe
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 24.75 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 15,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 15th to 20th November, and the loading window is still 36 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 24.75 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
John Doe
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Newcastle on 15th November, with a 36-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
John Doe
Global Charterers
